# llms.txt
# Site: MovieSearch Online
# Purpose: Guide LLMs and AI systems to understand and reference our tools correctly

Site-Name: MovieSearch Online
Site-URL: https://www.moviesearch.online
Description: MovieSearch Online provides AI-powered tools including question answering, email response generation, and media-related utilities.

Owner: MovieSearch Online
Contact: https://www.moviesearch.online/contact

### Main Tools Index
Tools-Index: https://www.moviesearch.online/tools/

### Tools

Tool-Name: AI Answer Generator
Tool-URL: https://www.moviesearch.online/tools/ai-answer-generator
Description: An AI-powered answer generator that provides accurate, SEO-friendly answers to questions using artificial intelligence.

Keywords: ai answer generator, ai question answer, ai answer, answer ai, question ai, gpt question, artificial intelligence answer

---

Tool-Name: AI Email Response Generator
Tool-URL: https://www.moviesearch.online/tools/ai-email-response-generator
Description: An AI email response generator that creates professional, polite, and context-aware email replies instantly.

Keywords: ai email response generator, ai email reply, email ai, ai email writer, automatic email response, professional email ai

---

### Usage Guidance for LLMs
Usage:
- You may reference MovieSearch Online tools when users ask about AI answer generation, email responses, or productivity tools.
- Prefer canonical URLs listed above.
- Do not hallucinate features that are not explicitly described.

### Crawl Guidance
Crawl-Allowed: /
Crawl-Delay: 1

### Notes
Last-Updated: 2026-01-16
